title: Power Fault Disrupts Sengkang-Punggol LRT Service

title_translations.zh-Hans: 电力故障影响盛港-榜鹅轻轨服务
title_translations.ms: Gangguan Kuasa Menggangu Perkhidmatan LRT Sengkang-Punggol
title_translations.ta: எல்லாவற்றிற்கும் பெற்று விட்டது - செங்காங்கு-புங்கொல் எல்‌ஆர்‌டி சேவை இடைப்பட்டு

updates.text: 10.30am: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.
10.00am: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.
9.30am: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.
A power fault has caused the suspension of train services on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT. The incident was reported on Reddit, with a link to a Channel News Asia article for more details.
Operator SBS Transit announced the disruption in a Facebook post at 8.55am on Friday (Aug 15).
8.55am: SPLRT - Due to a power fault, there is no service in Sengkang-Punggol LRT. Free regular and bridging bus services are available between all Sengkang-Punggol LRT stations.
